channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Bitcoin reaches 50% market dominance for first time in 2 years
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Blackrock’s spot ETF filing and the Securities and Exchange Commission's crackdown on crypto are driving investors toward Bitcoin.

item.title: Web3 usernames may see greater adoption due to recent advancements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: New developments such as free usernames, cross-chain names, and chat functions may lead to more addresses being associated with a name.

item.title: Why Cathie Wood is bullish on Coinbase stock and believes Bitcoin will reach $1 million
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Nibley
item.description: Cathie Wood recently added to her fund’s position in Coinbase Global stock and reiterated her call for a $1 million Bitcoin price. Is this in line with analysts’ expectations?

item.title: Lawmakers vs. the SEC vs. Binance: Law Decoded, June 12–19
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The SEC doesn’t have it all its own way in a court struggle with Binance.US and faces more media pressure.

item.title: Fear of a digital euro prompts Slovakia to add cash rule to constitution
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Slovakia’s parliament passed a measure to amend its constitution to codify the right of its citizens to pay for goods and services with cash.

item.title: Price analysis 6/19: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The strength in the S&P 500 and weakness in the U.S. Dollar Index could limit the short-term downside in Bitcoin and select altcoins.

item.title: UK government moves forward on financial markets bill for potential regulation of crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Following a third reading in the House of Lords, the Financial Services and Markets Bill will return to the lower house of the U.K. Parliament for members to consider any changes.

item.title: Crypto lender Delio to resume withdrawals after counterparty contagion
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: "We will come up with a plan to recover the loss," said company officials.

item.title: Crypto investment products experience outflows for 9th consecutive week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Meanwhile, the altcoin price crash triggered inflows for XRP, Cardano and Polygon.

item.title: Fed rate pause triggers traders’ pivot to stocks — Will Bitcoin catch up?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: U.S. stock markets hit year-to-date highs, the Fed paused rate hikes, and Binance.US and the SEC reached an agreement, but data shows Bitcoin bulls remain somewhat skittish.

item.title: IMF envisions ‘new class’ of cross-border payment platform with single ledger
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The XC platform could operate domestically using tokenized assets, including deposits, with or without CBDCs.

item.title: Realtor may have accepted $3M offer for Washington, DC property linked to Sam Bankman-Fried
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Washington, D.C. townhouse owned by Guarding Against Pandemics was listed as “contingent” on a real estate website, suggesting the party handling the deal has accepted an offer.

item.title: Etherscan launches AI-powered Code Reader
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The tool allows users to retrieve and interpret the source code of a specific contract address via an AI prompt.

item.title: How to use Solana Saga to buy and sell crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arunkumar Krishnakumar
item.description: The first mobile by a blockchain company, the Solana Saga was launched in April 2023. Can users benefit by using Saga for crypto transactions?

item.title: Why is Cardano price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is Cardano price down today
item.description: Cardano’s price is down today, continuing its decline for a fourth week in a row amid rate hike fears, an SEC crackdown and a recovering U.S. dollar.

item.title: 5 AI tools for video editing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover five powerful AI tools for video editing that enhance your editing process and boost creativity.

item.title: Do Kwon gets 4 months in prison in Montenegro on fake passport charges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Blanche Gatt
item.description: Terraform Labs founder sentenced to four months in jail after being found guilty of using a false Costa Rican passport.

item.title: Bear market allows crypto companies to ‘listen’ to users: KuCoin exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Dorian Vincileoni, an executive at KuCoin, spoke with Cointelegraph at the Proof of Talk blockchain conference in Paris about navigating the state of the current market.

item.title: Why ZK-rollups need data availability — Avail co-founder
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Zero-knowledge rollups hold great promise for scaling blockchains, but the technology requires certain provisions to ensure its success.

item.title: Slow Food: Kenny Schachter reflects on blockchain art’s past, present and future
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vittoria Benzine
item.description: NFTs might never boom at quite the same pitch they once did. With his first solo show in 25 years, Kenny Schachter sought to demonstrate how that’s a good thing.

item.title: Ethereum devs discuss increasing staking limit of validators by 64x
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The proposal received mixed reactions from the crypto community, with some users stressing that it would make the network more centralized.

item.title: CertiK receives $500K bounty after Sui blockchain threat discovery
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The vulnerability dubbed “HamsterWheel” traps nodes in an endless loop similar to hamsters jogging on a wheel.

item.title: Hawkish Fed, stocks market rally, and crypto falling behind
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains why the cryptocurrency market has been falling behind the stock market after the Fed’s hawkish stance.

item.title: Binance cancels registration for inactive business in the UK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Binance’s deregistration with the FCA did not have an operational impact, as it had never done business in the United Kingdom, the firm said.

item.title: Hong Kong says Cyberport attracted 150 Web3 firms in a year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Blanche Gatt
item.description: The country’s financial secretary says state funding and support have helped draw Web3 innovators to the digital hub.

item.title: Cointelegraph Accelerator welcomes Web3 venture builder GAMI as a strategic partner
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: GAMI, a Web3-focused Venture Builder, hosts a variety of products tailored to the web3 and blockchain world, with partners like Gerard Lopez, a globally renowned entrepreneur and investor.

item.title: AI has a ‘symbiotic relationship’ with blockchain: Animoca Brands CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The CEO of Animoca Brands, Robby Yung, spoke with Cointelegraph at the Proof of Talk blockchain conference in Paris about the future of AI and blockchain in gaming.

item.title: Most ‘fear’ in 3 months as $26.4K becomes key — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin sentiment is clinging to any optimism it can get — just like BTC price performance — as a new week of volatility triggers begins.

item.title: Do Kwon denies forging passport, blames ‘Chinese’ agency: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Do Kwon has denied forging travel documentation and refuted having any financial ties to Europe Now party leader Milojko Spajić.

item.title: ‘Britcoin’ launch inches closer after Project Rosalind CBDC tests
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: A major study between the Bank for International Settlements and the Bank of England found that a retail central bank digital currency could make peer-to-peer payments cheaper and easier.
